text: That's the best feeling! Any recommendations for my next read?
Definitely! $$  How about a. gripping thriller?
Sounds intriguing! $$  Hit me with the title.
"Gone Girl" by Gillian Flynn. Trust me, you won't be disappointed.
1: Thanks! I'll add it to my list.
No problem! $$  Let me know what you think once you finish it.   /
Will do! Thanks for the recommendation.
